When I know that there are those who have fallen into great sin, but we have labored with and for them, and God has afterward accepted their labors, when these have pleaded for me to let them go and to not burden myself for them, I have said, "I will not give you up; you must gather strength to overcome." These men are now in active service. [Either] this course 


                                   -339- 

toward them was wrong, or the course that is now pursued is not that which Jesus would pursue under similar circumstances.
